channel.title: Everinrsps 317/417
channel.description:
http://speedy.sh/4vdsf/EverinRSPS.jar
Version : 317 / 474 animations etcc..
Features of the engine/server/w.e.: - No Spikes/lagg. So it's very stable. - Rollback fixed. - 0,0% engine load. - Memory Leaks Fixed. - No deadlocks. - Server sided clipping.
In-Game Features: - Clue scrolls ( couple of fixes ! :) ) - Fishing Trawler ( needs fixes too ) - Duel Arena - Barbarian Assault (good old one) - Full Godwars - Decent Combat - Random events, river troll etc... - Many bosses - All skills, almost flawless and spread all over Runescape World. (There are teleports though) - Skillcape Masters with dialogue - Ranging guild minigame flawless - Warrior's guild - Jad - Fight pits - Tzhaar shops - Sailing - Fading - Full dagganoth Lair - Pest control - Mutant Tarn - The Inadequacy - Sea troll queen - Barrelchest - Barrows - Many Locations/Training locations/skilling locations - Boat can crash, desert you can see a mirror, dungeon can collapse (Random events) - So much more.......... Tired of typing
Come and check us out ! :) we have a community @ Facebook too : https://www.facebook.com/groups/1378033625790578/?ref=ts&fref=ts
Join, And Vote Alot ! :)
THAAANKS ! ;)
Owner : Pahur Mod : Maztek
Server looking for new mods :) !!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tWiP5JuH00Y
Thanks Goes to : Rune-server.org and all of them who helped me
And Very Special Thanks goes to Rune-PK MrClassic MCMXCV hhhzzzani
And EverinRSPS Supports Biohazard Project !
CLIENT ******************************************* * http://www.speedyshare.com/4vdsf/EverinRSPS.jar * *******************************************

item.title: Everinrsps 317/417
item.dc:creator: @epic_boobs epic boobs
item.description:
@epic_boobs wrote:

http://speedy.sh/4vdsf/EverinRSPS.jar

Version : 317 / 474 animations etcc…

Features of the engine/server/w.e.:

  • No Spikes/lagg. So it’s very stable.
  • Rollback fixed.
  • 0,0% engine load.
  • Memory Leaks Fixed.
  • No deadlocks.
  • Server sided clipping.

In-Game Features:

  • Clue scrolls ( couple of fixes ! )
  • Fishing Trawler ( needs fixes too )
  • Duel Arena
  • Barbarian Assault (good old one)
  • Full Godwars
  • Decent Combat
  • Random events, river troll etc…
  • Many bosses
  • All skills, almost flawless and spread all over Runescape World. (There are teleports though)
  • Skillcape Masters with dialogue
  • Ranging guild minigame flawless
  • Warrior’s guild
  • Jad
  • Fight pits
  • Tzhaar shops
  • Sailing
  • Fading
  • Full dagganoth Lair
  • Pest control
  • Mutant Tarn
  • The Inadequacy
  • Sea troll queen
  • Barrelchest
  • Barrows
  • Many Locations/Training locations/skilling locations
  • Boat can crash, desert you can see a mirror, dungeon can collapse (Random events)
  • So much more… Tired of typing

Come and check us out !
we have a community @ Facebook too :

Join, And Vote Alot !
